entries.title: Meta denies African content-moderator firm exit poses risk
entries.description: Sama, which runs Facebook's moderation hub for east Africa, is to stop providing content-review services.

entries.title: Iran protests: Facebook wrong to remove 'death to Khamenei' posts, board finds
entries.description: Use of the slogan "death to Khamenei" in Persian did not break guidelines, a review finds.

entries.title: Almost 90% of games sold in UK in 2022 were digital - ERA
entries.description: Physical game sales fell 4.5% last year, the digital entertainment and retail association says.

entries.title: Could floating solar farms survive out at sea?
entries.description: Engineers are working on building solar farms robust enough to survive in the open ocean.
